Package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control

Class InitiateBolusRequest

java.lang.Object
com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message
com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.InitiateBolusRequest
public class InitiateBolusRequest extends Message
Initiates a bolus. Must be done following a BolusPermissionRequest, which returns a bolusID that is used for completing the bolus.
Request message for InitiateBolusResponse, opCode -98, size 37
Message properties:
 opCode  -98 
 size  37 
 type  MessageType.REQUEST 
 characteristic  Characteristic.CONTROL 
 response  InitiateBolusResponse 
 signed  true 
 modifiesInsulinDelivery  true

  • Constructor Details

    • InitiateBolusRequest

      public InitiateBolusRequest()

    • InitiateBolusRequest

      public InitiateBolusRequest(byte[] raw)

    • InitiateBolusRequest

      public InitiateBolusRequest(long totalVolume, int bolusID, int bolusTypeBitmask, long foodVolume, long correctionVolume, int bolusCarbs, int bolusBG, long bolusIOB)
      The final command which initiates a bolus. Must specify a bolusID returned from BolusPermissionResponse.
      Parameters:
      totalVolume - the amount of insulin to be delivered, in milliunits. Use InsulinUnit.from1To1000(java.lang.Float).
      bolusID - the bolus ID returned from BolusPermissionResponse
      bolusTypeBitmask - the bitmask of bolus type. Use BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusType.toBitmask(BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusType...)
      foodVolume - the amount of insulin attributed within metadata from food (carbs; optional)
      correctionVolume - the amount of insulin attributed within metadata from a correction (optional)
      bolusCarbs - the number of carbs attributed within metadata (optional)
      bolusBG - the current BG attributed within metadata, if overridden from the current CGM reading (optional)
      bolusIOB - the current IOB attributed within metadata (optional)

    • InitiateBolusRequest

      public InitiateBolusRequest(long totalVolume, int bolusID, int bolusTypeBitmask, long foodVolume, long correctionVolume, int bolusCarbs, int bolusBG, long bolusIOB, long extendedVolume, long extendedSeconds, long extended3)
      The final command which initiates a bolus. Must specify a bolusID returned from BolusPermissionResponse.
      Parameters:
      totalVolume - the amount of insulin to be delivered, in milliunits. Use InsulinUnit.from1To1000(java.lang.Float). For an extended bolus, this is the amount delivered now. The total amount of insulin delivered over the entire extended bolus period is totalVolume+extendedVolume.
      bolusID - the bolus ID returned from BolusPermissionResponse
      bolusTypeBitmask - the bitmask of bolus type. Use BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusType.toBitmask(BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusType...)
      foodVolume - the amount of insulin attributed within metadata from food (carbs; optional)
      correctionVolume - the amount of insulin attributed within metadata from a correction (optional)
      bolusCarbs - the number of carbs attributed within metadata (optional)
      bolusBG - the current BG attributed within metadata, if overridden from the current CGM reading (optional)
      bolusIOB - the current IOB attributed within metadata (optional)
      extendedVolume - the amount of insulin to be delivered delayed via an extended bolus section, in milliunits. Use InsulinUnit.from1To1000(java.lang.Float).
      extendedSeconds - the length of the extended bolus in seconds.
      extended3 - TODO unknown, set as 0
